verses.verse: (All Lands Summoned to Praise God) (A Psalm for the thank offering.) Make a joyful noise to the LORD, all the lands! (Heb land or earth)
Serve the LORD with gladness! Come into his presence with singing!
Know that the LORD is God! It is he that made us, and we are his; (Another reading is and not we ourselves) we are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.
Enter his gates with thanksgiving, and his courts with praise! Give thanks to him, bless his name!
For the LORD is good; his steadfast love endures for ever, and his faithfulness to all generations.
